mace_train_plugin.tests
=======================

.. py:module:: mace_train_plugin.tests

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Tests for the plugin.

   Includes both tests written in unittest style (test_cli.py) and tests written
   in pytest style (test_calculations.py).

-----------

   :maxdepth: 1

   /autoapi/mace_train_plugin/tests/input_files/index
